price: Eto, to je Džennet, koji ste u nasljedstvo dobili za ono što ste radili;
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
